Source: components/CustomTouch.js

import React, { Component } from 'react';

import {
  Text,
  View,
  Platform,
  TouchableHighlight,
  TouchableOpacity,
  TouchableNativeFeedback,
  StyleSheet,
  TouchableWithoutFeedback
} from 'react-native';

const CustomTouchWrapper = ({highlight, onPress, children, styles }) => {
  if (Platform.OS === 'android') {
    return (
      <TouchableNativeFeedback
        onPress={onPress}
        style = {styles}>
          {children}
      </TouchableNativeFeedback>
    );
  }
  if(highlight) {
      return (
          <TouchableHighlight
            style={styles}
            onPress={onPress}>
            {children}
        </TouchableHighlight>
      )
  }
  return (
    <TouchableWithoutFeedback
      style={styles}
      onPress={onPress}>
      {children}
  </TouchableWithoutFeedback>
  );
};

/**
 * Custom Touch a common touchable component which handles both android and ios
 */
class CustomTouch extends Component {
  render() {
    return (
      <CustomTouchWrapper {...this.props}></CustomTouchWrapper>
    );
  }
}

export default CustomTouch;
